Package com.day.cq.wcm.mobile.api.device

Provides a Mobile API.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Device
    Provides information about a specific mobile device, in the context of a specific HTTP request.
    DeviceGroup
    A DeviceGroup represents a segment of mobile devices.
    DeviceGroupFilter
    A DeviceGroupFilter specifies filtering of device groups against a user agent extracted from the request and a set of mobile device capabilities extracted from the WURFL database.
    DeviceGroupList  
    DeviceGroupPredicate
    A predicate to evaluate device groups with.
    DeviceGroupProvider
    The DeviceGroupProvider provides access to existing device groups.
    DeviceMapper
    Maps HTTP requests to Device instances

Package com.day.cq.wcm.mobile.api.device Description

Provides a Mobile API.
